64346.「ほおっ <pc>！ 来てくれたか。\n ちーと 頼みたいことがあって\n そな:
Ho ho! I see you've come. I was hoping you
would, as I have a favor to ask.

64347.「じつはな なんと……\n 元の姿に戻る方法が 判明したんじゃよ！:
As a matter of fact, I've...
I've figured out to return back to normal!

64348.「我が国に伝わる 古文書によると\n 強力な へんげの呪いを解く 聖なる泉が\n:
According to an ancient manuscript, there is
a sacred spring located in a place called
Jyra Jungle. It can break powerful curses!

64349.「その名も クドゥスの泉じゃ。\n そこに 身をひたせば かかった呪いが\n た:
The spring itself is called the Kudus
Spring. If you dowse yourself in its waters,
it will instantly wash away any curse...

64350.「この姿のままじゃと 国事をとりおこなうにも\n 支障をきたすのでな。一刻も早く:
I will not be able to go about my kingly
affairs if I am to remain like this. I must
become a human again as soon as possible.

64351.「本来なら 城の兵士と ジャイラ密林へ行き\n クドゥスの泉を 探すところじゃが:
Normally, I'd have my soldiers come along
with me, but only a few know my true identity.

64353.「どうじゃ？ デフェル荒野の北西にある\n ジャイラ密林の クドゥスの泉まで\n:
Well? Will you escort me to the Kudus Spring?
It's located in the Jyra Jungle, northwest of
the Defel Desert.

64354.「おおっ。そうこなくっちゃ じゃ！\n おぬしを見込んで 頼んでみて よかったわ:
Oh, I knew I could count on you! Just what
I'd expect.

64355.「そういうことで ワシは おぬしのあとを\n コッソリ ジットリ つけていくぞよ:
I will follow closely behind you while keeping
myself hidden. Let's be on our way!

64356.「おお。ありがたや……と 言いたいところじゃが\n おぬし 他の者からの頼まれご:
Ah, thank you, but... it seems you already
have your hands quite full with other requests
right now.

64357.「それらを 速やかに片付けて\n 急いで 戻ってまいるのじゃ。\n ワシ ここで:
Please take care of those first, but hurry
back. I'll be waiting.

64358.「おおっ <pc>！\n 責任感の強い おぬしのことじゃから\n 必ずや また:
Oh, <pc>! I knew you'd come back.
You have a strong sense of responsibility,
I can tell!

64359.「古文書によると 強力な へんげの呪いを解く\n 聖なる泉が デフェル荒野の北西:
According to an ancient manuscript, there is
a sacred spring located in a place called
Jyra Jungle. It can break powerful curses!

64360.「その名も クドゥスの泉。\n その泉まで ワシを連れていってほしいんじゃ。:
The spring is called the Kudus Spring.
I'd like you to take me there.

64361.「クドゥスの泉に 身をひたせば へんげの呪いが\n 解けて 人間の姿に戻れると思:
I believe that if I bathe myself in its
waters, the curse will be lifted and I will
be human once more. Will you help me?

64363.「おぬしには デフェル荒野の北西の\n ジャイラ密林のどこかにあるという\n ク:
I want you to take me to that spring. It's
somewhere in the Jyra Jungle, which is
northwest of the Defel Desert.

64364.「古文書の通りならば そのクドゥスの泉に\n 身をひたせば へんげの呪いが 解け:
If the ancient texts are to be believed, then
a short dip in the spring should break the
curse and make me human again!

64365.「ささっ <pc>。出発じゃ！\n 心配せんでも ワシは おぬしの後ろを\n ヒ:
Come on, let's be on our way! Don't worry,
I will follow closely behind you and stay
out of sight.

64366.「ふぉ……！ ここが かのクドゥスの泉じゃな。\n 確かに 神秘的なニオイが プ:
Ho...! This must be the Kudus Spring! It
certainly has a mysterious aroma!

64367.「さて……。本当に 呪いが解けるかどうか\n 確かめねばならんのう。:
Now... let us see if my curse can truly be
lifted.

64368.「<pc>。ワシに もしものことがあったら\n よろしく 頼んだぞ……。:
If anything happens to me, I'll be counting
on you...

64370.「<pc>……。\n これは ぬかよろこびだったようじゃ。\n クドゥスの泉には:
It seems this wasn't nearly what it was all
chalked up to be. Seems the spring doesn't
do anything...

64374.「やったぞい！！\n 元の姿に 戻れたぞよ！: It worked! I'm back to normal!!

64375.「どうじゃ？ <pc>。ふっふふー♪\n 前の ヌメヌメした姿からは\n 想像が:
Well, what do you think? Fufufu... you
probably had no idea such a handsome face was
hiding under all that sliminess, did you?

64376.「むほー！ ワシは もうバケモノじゃない！\n これで ワシは ワシはっ……。:
Wahoo! I'm not a monster anymore! I'm...
I'm...

64378.「国王である ワシだけが……。\n ワシが ふがいないせいで\n 皆に 苦しい思:
As the king, only I... only I could have
caused so much suffering due to my
ineptitude...

64379.「ゴリウス兵士長に 率いられた兵士たちと\n 戦争に駆り出された まもの使いたち:
Those soldiers led by Gorius, and the Monster
Masters sent to war... where in the world
were they taken?

64380.「あの者たちも この泉に連れてきて\n 人間の姿に 戻してやりたいのう……。\n:
I want to find them, and bring them to this
spring to return them all to normal...
I must find them somehow.

64381.「<pc>！ ご苦労じゃった。\n アラハギーロへ戻ったら 玉座の間まで\n 来:
Thank you for your assistance! Please come
to the throne room when you return to
Al-Ahagiro. I'd like to reward you!

66966.「なん……じゃと……？ ワシの恩人が\n そんな 非情なヤツじゃったとは……。:
You... won't...? I didn't think my benefactor
could be so heartless...

66967.「でも ワシ おぬしの気が変わるのを\n 信じて ここで待っておるからな。:
But I shall wait here. I will hope that you
will change your mind.
